t:
One, two, darkness creeping through,
Three, four, footsteps near the door,
Five, six, shadows playing tricks,
Seven, eight, anxiety's weight,
Nine, ten, fear settles in.

Eleven, twelve, whispers in the delve,
Thirteen, fourteen, a chilling unseen,
Fifteen, sixteen, shivers down the spine,
Seventeen, eighteen, a presence keen,
Nineteen, twenty, nightmares plenty.
c:
Here's a #badnurseryrhyme. There's more, if you want, just follow the tag!

Extended:
21, 22, something's coming for you,
23, 24, lock the windows, close the door,
25, 26, crosses and charms, quick to fix,
27, 28, keep the demons at bay, never late,
29, 30, the clock tolls, fear grows sturdy.

31, 32, echoes of dread, voices pursue,
33, 34, scratching at the floor,
35, 36, goosebumps amidst the mix,
37, 38, despair's weight,
39, 40, in the darkness, danger aplenty.

41, 42, they're watching, they pursue,
43, 44, haunted to the core,
45, 46, can't escape, can't fix,
47, 48, horrors escalate,
49, 50, in this nightmare, no more pity.


Inspired by a similar poem in "Lucid Dream Adventure: Mystery" by Dali Games: adventure games.



#onetwo #horror #nightmare #darkness #anxiety #fear #demons
